tool_description: Allows you to get the current RSI indicator of a trading pair(s) on timeframes of 15 minutes, 1 hour, 4 hours and 1 day. Best suitable for trading robots.
name: Binance RSI indicator
title: Binance RSI indicator

api_list.name: Get RSI by Pairs
api_list.description: Get RSI indicator for all trading pairs on Binance.com

required_parameters.name: pairs
required_parameters.description: Trading pairs for quote USDT, BTC, ETH or BNB in uppercase separated by commas

required_parameters.name: timeframe
required_parameters.description:
Timeframe for calculate RSI is available: 

- **15m** - 15 minutes 
- **1h** - 1 hour 
- **4h** - 4 hours
- **1d** - 1 day
